name: SCP - Village
description:
• W A S D 
  • RUN - SHIFT
  • WEAPON - Q

The first day in a new place, officer Chris Morgan was glad that he had transferred to a police station in a small provincial town. Quiet and peaceful place, what could go wrong here?

But everything changed in an instant, when his work shift was coming to an end.

Waiting for you:

  • Survival horror,
  • Dangerous enemies and bosses,
  • Interesting story,
  • And the indescribable atmosphere of a screen resolution of 64 by 64 pixels.

Can you unravel the sinister mystery of an abandoned village?

From the author:

Hello, thank you for visiting this page, if you liked the game, I will be glad for your support for its early release on Steam :)

My Steam page
